page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: There are three types of Education establishments in our area.{ALL {SAINTS CHURCH OF ENGLAND }is a nursery and a first school taking children from 4 to 8 years of age.It has 4 to 6 teachers and there 52 children who attend part time and 96 full time.Nursery hours on Monday to Thursday are 9:00am to 3:15pm as is the first schools but on Friday the whole school finishes at 3:00pm. {NICHOLAS CHAMBERLAINE }is a secondary school and has 87 teachers there are 1567 pupils.The school caters for children between the ages of 12 to 18.Most children leave at 16 but some stay on for the sixth form. Other secondary schools around { {BEDWORTH}do not have sixth forms so their older children attend the one at {NICHOLAS CHAMBERLAINE.
